Text: Kudos for being the 1st ( 1st I've seen) to release a TS of this movie!! I'll report back after checking out the sample...

Just got done checking out the sample... it's one of the best TS releases I've seen in a long time!!! The night scene isn't blacked out like with some I've seen, and the colors/whites aren't washed out either. Very good quality for sound & video... I'd say 9/9 or better... def worth getting if you can't wait til the rip or BR
